mapper.insert: insert into sys_param (id, param_key, param_value, company_id, remark_, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_param set param_key = #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_value = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, param_key, param_value, company_id, remark_, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_param where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, param_key, param_value, company_id, remark_, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_param
